turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu güzel resmi yapsan sanat öğretmeni seni övecek.
english_example_sentence: If you were to do this beautiful painting, the art teacher would praise you.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты сделал эту красивую картину, учитель искусства похвалил бы тебя.
